titles.title: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to eliminate any confusion regarding the applicability of the payment quantity limitations to the transition payment required as part of national dairy market loss payments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 9/13/2002--Introduced. Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 with respect to the applicability of payment quantity limitations to national dairy market loss transition payments.
